name: Classic Pancakes
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, beat eggs and mix with milk and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
Heat a nonstick pan over medium heat.
Pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake onto pan.
Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook until golden.
notes: Try adding blueberries or chocolate chips.
